remarks: Definition of the category Ring, relativized to a subset ` u ` .  This is the category of all unital rings in ` u ` and homomorphisms between these rings.  Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2020.)  (Revised by AV, 8-Mar-2020.)
statement: df-ringc $p |- RingCat = ( u e. _V |-> ( ( ExtStrCat ` u ) |`cat ( RingHom |` ( ( u i^i Ring ) X. ( u i^i Ring ) ) ) ) ) $.
